personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.description: Dedicated JavaScript developer with 2 years of experience in web application development. Specializes in React, TypeScript, and UI optimization, with a passion for delivering performant and scalable solutions. Proficient at cross-functional teamwork, clean code practices, and crafting user-centric interfaces.

workExperience.description: Implement responsive and accessible UIs using React, improving user engagement by 30%. Manage application state using modern tools, reducing state-related bugs by 40% and improving development. Collaborate closely with backend and QA teams to plan and deliver features on biweekly sprints, achieving 95% sprint completion rate.

Implemented full-stack features using the MERN stack – enhancing coding accuracy by 40%. Coordinated with an Agile team to deliver two feature-complete web apps – increasing 500+ monthly users. Organized code reviews and participated in sprint planning, boosting team workflow quality and reducing merge conflicts by 20%.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
education.description: Currently pursuing advanced studies in Artificial Intelligence with focus on machine learning, deep learning, and AI applications in software development.

education.institution: The National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences (FAST)
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with comprehensive knowledge in computer science fundamentals, software engineering, algorithms, and data structures. Focused on web development and modern programming practices.

projects.name: Joey Joey: Empowering Social Events
projects.description: Developed dynamic event interfaces using React and RSVP — increasing user engagement by 30%. A comprehensive social events platform that enables users to create, discover, and manage social events with real-time RSVP functionality.

projects.name: Shopper: Promoting Eco-Friendly Shopping Habits
projects.description: Developed a strategic plan to promote eco-friendly shopping, designed to reach 1000+ users and increase sustainable fashion awareness. An e-commerce platform focused on sustainable and eco-friendly products with educational content about environmental impact.

projects.name: CL Bot: AI Assistant for Productivity
projects.description: Launched an intelligent assistant for task scheduling — reducing missed tasks by 200+ per month. An AI-powered productivity bot that helps users manage their schedules, set reminders, and optimize their daily workflow.
